module.sqlWrap: SELECT TOP(@Top) * FROM VedioComment WHERE VedioId = @VedioId ORDER BY CreatedTime DESC
SELECT TOP(@Top) vc.* FROM VedioComment vc INNER JOIN Vedio v ON vc.VedioId = v.VedioId WHERE v.CircleId = @CircleId ORDER BY CreatedTime DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT vc.CommentId,c.CircleId,c.CircleName,c.Logo AS CircleLogo,v.VedioId,v.Title AS VedioTitle,rvc.Contents AS ParentContents,vc.PassportId,vc.ReplyPassportId,vc.ParentId,vc.Contents,vc.CreatedTime, (SELECT COUNT(CommentId) FROM VedioComment WHERE ParentId = vc.CommentId) AS ReplyCount FROM VedioComment vc LEFT JOIN VedioComment rvc ON vc.ParentId = rvc.CommentId INNER JOIN Vedio v ON vc.VedioId = v.VedioId INNER JOIN Circle c ON v.CircleId = c.CircleId WHERE ((vc.Contents LIKE @Keyword) OR (v.Title LIKE @Keyword) OR (c.CircleName LIKE @Keyword)) AND vc.ParentId = CASE WHEN @ParentId = 0 THEN vc.ParentId ELSE @ParentId END ) t ORDER BY CreatedTime DESC
DELETE FROM VedioComment WHERE CommentId=@CommentId AND PassportId=@PassportId; DELETE FROM VedioComment WHERE ParentId=@CommentId;
